games.name: assassin’s creed
games.des: another year, another mediocre game from Ubisoft. Looks like the French studio is only aiming for easy profit.

games.name: Dishonored.jpg
games.des: after all console gamers praised Dishonored and named it “Game Of The Year” Arkane Studios announced PC release.

games.name: need for speed
games.des: Reignite the pursuit in Need for Speed™ Hot Pursuit Remastered. Out now on PS4, Xbox, PC and Nintendo Switch.

games.name: call of duty wwii
games.des: After freeing former chemical weapons expert Stitch from the Gulag, Perseus has resurrected the long-dormant weapons facility and restarted the Nova 6 Nerve Gas program.
